attributes.action: deport all non UK criminals to their country of origin to serve any sentence handed out by our justice system, with no right to appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will ensure that our criminal system is able to cope with UK citizens who are currently not given custodial sentances due to lack of space/facilities to serve the sentances as given.  It will also show that those wishing to reside in the UK must abide by our laws or be forced to return to their own country of origin to serve their sentence,irrespective of their claim to remain - political asylum, etc. where the criminal system may be much harsher than it is here.
